channel.title: Posts on Hello, it's Eliza speaking
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Hello, it's Eliza speaking

item.title: The start.
item.description: Hello world, it’s Eliza speaking. Today I’m starting at the start. It is the 1st of the month, my first week of university for the year, and this is my first ever blog post! If you’ve found yourself here reading, thank you so much for taking the time! I hope that my blog brings you great joy, relief, support, life hacks, craft tips, a simple smile; I just hope that you can take something positive away with you.
